relationship: {"cross": "SELECT CWE_TABLE.* FROM 'tables/CWE_TABLE.csv' AS CWE_TABLE INNER JOIN 'tables/CVE_TABLE.csv' USING (CWE) WHERE CVE = :item"}
{"cross": "SELECT CVE_TABLE.* FROM 'tables/CVE_TABLE.csv' AS CVE_TABLE INNER JOIN 'tables/MFL_TABLE.csv' USING (CVE) WHERE MFL = :item"}
